Desc.entry: Sheffield CIL is a disability organisation whose aim is to promote choice, control and independence for disabled people in Sheffield. Offers a free, independent disability information service for disabled volunteers and an advocacy service that can support disabled people to access health, social care or provide help on any disability related issue. Regularly consult with disabled people on local and national disability issues and delivers disability equality training on request. SCIL is a membership and user-led organisation, run and controlled by disabled people. Co-ordinates the Sheffield Disability Network.
